title: Urgot bug?
body: I know that not alot of people play urgot, but for the few that do have you noticed that his e + q combo is kind of buggy? I was in a game just recently against an annie and i constantly found my q missiles going into nothing even when the annie was marked with my e. I dont know whether she was scripting or what but it rarely worked properly. So I didn't know if anyone else had experienced it, but as a key part of urgot's kit, if it is a bug it might want to be dealt with somewhat quickly

replies.body: to actually lock on you have to have your cursor hovered over the target champion affected with nox c charge for it to lock properly otherwise q will fire off as normal, so you may not have had the cursor close enough, i do it all the time.
Oh ok thank you. I just might not have realised i was properly aiming every time i played urgot. I usually play when im tired, so i just must not realised im doing it {{item:3070}}
Even with the lock on you must aim.
